comment: Let me preface this by saying that I dreaded taking statistics. I loathed stats in high school. Prof. Orsini made it easy, not because his class was slack-off easy (it's not), but because he made statistics easy to understand and work with. Suddenly this chore of a subject became my favorite class, thanks to him. Take his class, trust me.

Mr. Orsini is the best professor I've had yet! He is so helpful and always available. There are 3 tests and a final, but your final replaces your lowest test grade. He is the nicest professor I have ever been around and treats students with respect. I ended up with an A. I HIGHLY reccomend him!!

Excellent professor! Took him for the 8 week summer session of STAT 1107 and got an A! He is very nice and helpful and even welcomes questions. He makes himself available for students when they need him. He even worked with me over an emergency medical issue I had that caused me to miss the final exam. Great professor! I recommend him 100%!

THE BEST PROFESSOR I'VE HAD YET!  He is clear about his expectations, extremely helpful, and tests are pretty easy. Don't worry about reading the book because he doesn't really teach from it. Attend all classes because he tells you things that will be on tests especially for the final. I would highly recommend this professor!
Professor Orsini is an excellent teacher. He is very clear all the homework is easy because he explains everything you need to know. TAKE HIM IF YOU WANT AN A!!!

Mr. Orsini is AWESOME!!! When i thought about statistics I was intimidating at first but Mr. Orsini was so very helpful and made the class fun and I understood exactly everything I was doing! He offers help after class and the online activities are great! He is the BEST! Highly recommend this Professor!
This class was very easy and Mr. Orsini is super helpful.

He's very helpful and clear, always asking if you understand willing to help if not. There are statsportal assignments,and excel hws(which he gives you the step-by-step,got A's on all). I took this class in HS and hated it, but his class was very clear and easy. Take him!
